issue.title: [Website] Add favicons and meta tags
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6127](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6127). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Among the things I noticed recently that should be easy to clean up:
 \* We should supply a favicon
 \* The <title> is the same for every page and it always says "Apache Arrow Homepage"
 \* There are no opengraph or twitter card meta tags, so there's no link preview
 \* The version of bootstrap used is not current and has been flagged as a possible security vulnerability

Much of this could just be fixed by porting to a modern Hugo template, which I'll explore.
